text: Paul Gray (28 November 1963 â€“ 24 April 2018) was an Australian singer- songwriter, pianist and record producer. He met with early success as the lead vocalist for the 1980s funk/pop band Wa Wa Nee. Gray died on 24 April 2018 of multiple myeloma in Melbourne at the age of 54.Paul Gray, lead singer of 1980s pop/funk band Wa Wa Nee, has died of cancer ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from multiple myeloma Category:Cancer deaths in Australia Category:Australian singer-songwriters Category:Australian pianists Category:Australian record producers
title: Paul Gray (songwriter)
